name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Modern C++ Software Developer with over 13 years of comprehensive experience in delivering high-performance applications, particularly within regulated industries like healthcare and finance. Proficient in **C++ 20**, incorporating **Boost.Asio** for networking, and emphasizing **unit testing**, **asynchronous programming**, and **object-oriented principles** to produce robust software solutions. Skilled in **design patterns** and **UML design** for effective application architecture. Proven ability to integrate with financial protocols like **FIX protocol** and utilize APIs such as **MetaTrader API**. Experienced in problem-solving and profiling to enhance application performance.
Additionally, I possess a strong foundation in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with extensive hands-on expertise in both frontend and backend frameworks including **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Environmental experience includes developing AI/ML-driven platforms, deploying on **AWS** and **Azure**, and implementing microservices and CI/CD pipelines. Communicative and approachable, I excel in a team-oriented environment, ensuring compliance with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. A proactive self-starter with strong interpersonal skills, I aim to drive project success while maintaining professional English proficiency.
